Package com.atakmap.coremap.maps.coords

Class DistanceCalculations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.coremap.maps.coords.DistanceCalculations
  • @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="4.1",
               forRemoval=true,
               removeAt="4.4")
public final class DistanceCalculations
extends java.lang.Object
    Deprecated.
    use GeoCalculations or instance methods on GeoPoint
    Utility functions to compute distances on the Earth.

      • rotateTransformation

        public static GeoPoint[] rotateTransformation​(GeoPoint refPoint,
                                              double[][] yxcoords,
                                              double angle)
        Deprecated.
        Computes a rotation of a given yxcoordinates and a angle center point pair that is the resultant GeoPoints without any altitude values.
        Parameters:
        refPoint - the reference point to rotate around.
        yxcoords - the yx coordinates to use for rotation.
        angle - the angle by which to rotate.

      • normalizeBearing

        public static double normalizeBearing​(double bearing)
        Deprecated.
        Bring a bearing between [-180..180]
        Parameters:
        bearing - the bearing.
        Returns:
        A value that might be between -180..180.

      • calculateSlantRange

        public static double calculateSlantRange​(GeoPoint startPoint,
                                         GeoPoint endPoint)
        Deprecated.
        given points at different elevations, find the Slant Range between the 2 points. Basically this returns the hypotenuse of the right triangle created by the two points.
        Parameters:
        startPoint -
        endPoint -
        Returns:
        - the slant range in meters between the 2 points. If one or both points does not have a valid elevation, return Double.NaN

      • haversine

        public static double haversine​(double lat1deg,
                               double lon1deg,
                               double lat2deg,
                               double lon2deg)
        Deprecated.
        Returns the angular distances across a curved surface using haversine algorithm.
        Parameters:
        lat1deg - the latitude in degrees
        lon1deg - the longitude in degrees
        lat2deg - the latitude in degrees
        lon2deg - the longitude in degrees

      • getMeridianArcLength

        public static double getMeridianArcLength​(double latitude1,
                                          double latitude2)
        Deprecated.
        Calculates the meridian arc length between two points in the same meridian in the referenced ellipsoid.
        Parameters:
        latitude1 - The latitude of the first point (in decimal degrees).
        latitude2 - The latitude of the second point (in decimal degrees).
        Returns:
        Returned the meridian arc length between latitude1 and latitude2

      • computeDirection

        public static double[] computeDirection​(GeoPoint a,

        Deprecated.
        Computes the azimuth from True North and distance (m) from a to b using the WGS 84 Ellipsoid.
        Returns:
